title: Beautifully Broken
description: Are certain secrets meant to be kept so fate can have its way?Jack Jones and Michelle Davis fall in love, get married, and have a child—Pepper Jones. They live in Front Royal, Virginia where Jack has a successful landscaping business, and Michelle becomes the teacher she’s always wanted to be. It would seem Jack and Michelle have the perfect everything—perfect relationship, perfect family, perfect life. But appearances are often misleading. Confessions may have spared them, yet no one said a word. Not for a very long time.Love someone enough and you'll forgive just about anything. The real challenge is forgiving yourself when you've done the unthinkable to the person who has your heart.
author: Missi Magalis
